text: Beutin is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A small village situated some 4 miles(6 km) northwest of Montreuil-sur-Mer, on the N39 road, by the banks of the Canche river. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de- Calais
title: Beutin
